name: Dark Music from Outer Space [MFOS]
description:
This is a simple dark theme, which removes some clutter and makes it easier on the eyes.
It also "centers" the content.

Tested on the SYNTHDIY pages, should work ok with the rest of the pages too.

I tried preserving the original style as much as I could

user.name: At-M('s Upload)
user.about:
I'm a (currently Hobby- )Webdeveloper born 1994 in Germany.

Those Styles I am developing is just for fun and for myself mainly.

Please report all Bugs, you find and im happy to answer questions and see ideas

If you like those, I am glad to tell you, i now got Paypal and you could donate to me :)

----
Gamers!
Visit my Minecraftserver -> Connectcraft.de :)
